specsKey: Nikon Coolpix P530 Point & Shoot Camera

i purchased this yesterday from a local store for 17.5k.This camera is realy awsome..but donot realy pump your expectation like a dslr camera,but it definitly does the job if you are new in photography..pictures in low light has a promlem to keep in focus and slight shaky hands will find dificulty to take perfect pictures(specialy in macro shot).flash is awsome and helps a lot to take amazing pictures...better use night mode if you are clicking pictures of moon in night..at full zoom you will not get a perfect steady shot,so selection night mode will fix this issue....daylight pictures are awsome over all picture quality,if taken perfectly will bolw your mind...no wifi,view finder is a steal,it has manual control as well as auto,operation is very simple and easy(anyone can operate without problem....go for it for this price value

I bought this yesterday . Cam is good but drawback is dominating the yellow shade. i am unable to capture original picture colors. I put it on auto mode and took the snaps but the cam is failed to capture true colors pic has captured mixed with yellow shade. this is not fair
It's chager started not working after 30 days only. When I called nikon customer care, executive told that they dont cover accessaries in 1 year warranty.
excellent product with good price. it will nicely capture the photos and videos, it has the very good zoom capacity. Nikon designed a good product
Excellent camera.its zoom is unbelievable and it covers upto1km distance.Camera quality is very very good with wide lenses.Flash is simply great.Overall best product i feel.So, go for it.

Thnks flipkart and ws retail.A very good camera for biggners with less than 16000.The camera has excillent picture quality with a bunch of features.I think it is the great product speacilly with the price.I got also a bag,hdmi cable,8 gb class 10 sd card by sundisk and also thnk you ws retail.In other shop the price is 18000-19500 but in ws retail it is affortable.

>Super Zoom >Great flash performance >Great battery life >Good indoor shots >snappy >Has a decent EVF You wouldn't regret! i got it for 14k along with 8GB card n carry case, i think its a real good deal!

it is an amazing product by nikon.. it's within budget.. i've purchased it for rs 16680... it's zoom is unbelievable.. it shows a crystal clear effect even in 42x..... the colour sensation is good.. the auto focus is little bit slow.... it is good for auto and programmed mode..... the grip is very well designed.. it can easily fit to hand.. the inbuilt photo editing programmer is great..... the operating programme is very easily and can be operated by any one.... the video recording is full hd.... the battery backup is not too good.... as a conclusion it is very good and helpful for beginner photographers...... it is easy and within your budget.... :)

This is the one of the best cameras i have ever seen. the zoom is superb ...even at 78x it is crystal clear. slow motion photography results are awesome. i purchased it before it came to flipkart . if you want to know what this camera do , you should visit the page- Photography Without a Slr at Facebook . fb/youngpointandclick are their address . I bet after seeing the photos captured on this camera you must will buy this
Nothing is mentioned about warrant...it just say 2 years of warranty Need to know how to avail the warranty of Nikon p530. Kindly list down the procedure for the same
